message.body: Hey
Niks prospect job is to bring him a burrito
Hahaha
Do you think we can make that happen?
Haha

Yes. Also, I never said all Palestinians are terrorists and Avery is an ass to make that straw man argument and claim I said that. I never even said that America shouldn't accept Palestinians from refugee camps. I was pointing out the hypocrisy of expecting Israelis to live under an Arab/Palestinian nation when every other country won't even accept them in our borders bc they are afraid of them.
I actually never said what my personal feelings were at all and you both know that.
And also, it is rude to make jokes about my pregnancy and I still haven't received a congratulations.
But yes we can make a burrito happen.
I have to walk Jabba at 8 though so hurry back :)
lol Ps Merida is in the news bc of drug lords murdering lots and lots of other drug lords I suppose ￼
Ya know just 43 students kidnapped and murdered lol ￼
Adam was Super nice about it! I gave two weeks notice today ￼

Hey I didn't see that you posted the sonogram on your Instagram! That is so sweet! I love you and I'm sorry I give you a hard time sometimes. ❤️❤️❤️ Ps I'll call Avery today if I don't see him around then house and I'll explain that I actually Was complaining and hurt
*rhe
*the
Ugh
Hey!
How's work?
￼Mmmmm cheesecake. Work is wonderful.
I want that doggie burrito carrying tote for baby buffalo asap hahaha
That was a very cute video
How are you????
